rules.natural: Provided that paper conf_paper is accepted by reviewer1, the conference academic_conf2024 will be successful.
Under the condition that reviewer1 is unavailable for deadline1, paper conf_paper is either rejected by reviewer1 or accepted by reviewer1.
Reviewer1 is unavailable for deadline1 or reviewer1 is sick for deadline1.
Provided that reviewer1's flight with airlineX is cancelled, then whenever reviewer1 is sick for deadline1, paper conf_paper is either rejected by reviewer1 or accepted by reviewer1.
Either reviewer1's flight with airlineX is cancelled or reviewer1 has a train available on routeY.
If reviewer1 has a train available on routeY, then under the condition that reviewer1 is sick for deadline1, paper conf_paper is either rejected by reviewer1 or accepted by reviewer1.
If the paper conf_paper is presented remotely by author1, then the conference academic_conf2024 is successful.
Either the paper conf_paper is presented remotely by author1 or it is presented in person by author1.
Provided that the paper conf_paper is presented in person by author1, the presentation of conf_paper is recorded by tech_team.

If it is not the case that the publication of conf_paper proceedings by editor1 leads to the recording of the presentation by tech_team implying conference success, then manual review is needed for conf_paper by chair1.

facts.natural: The proceedings of conf_paper are published by editor1.
It is not the case that manual review is needed for conf_paper by chair1.
Paper conf_paper is not rejected by reviewer1.

steps.natural: If reviewer1 is sick for deadline1, then paper conf_paper is either rejected by reviewer1 or accepted by reviewer1.
Either paper conf_paper is rejected by reviewer1 or it is accepted by reviewer1.
Paper conf_paper is accepted by reviewer1.
If proceedings of conf_paper are published by editor1, then whenever the presentation of conf_paper is recorded by tech_team, the conference academic_conf2024 follows as successful.
If the presentation of conf_paper is recorded by tech_team, then the conference academic_conf2024 is successful.
Whenever the paper conf_paper is presented in person by author1, the conference academic_conf2024 is successful.

natural_facts.A1: The paper conf_paper is accepted by reviewer1.
natural_facts.A2: The paper conf_paper is rejected by reviewer1.
natural_facts.A5: Reviewer1's flight with airlineX is cancelled.
natural_facts.A6: Reviewer1 has a train available on routeY.
natural_facts.A7: The paper conf_paper is presented remotely by author1.
natural_facts.A8: The paper conf_paper is presented in person by author1.
natural_facts.A9: The presentation of conf_paper is recorded by the tech_team.
natural_facts.A10: The proceedings of conf_paper are published by editor1.
natural_facts.A11: Manual review is needed for conf_paper by chair1.

natural_expressions: Provided that paper conf_paper is accepted by reviewer1, the conference academic_conf2024 will be successful.
If proceedings of conf_paper are published by editor1, then whenever the presentation of conf_paper is recorded by tech_team, the conference academic_conf2024 follows as successful.
Either paper conf_paper is rejected by reviewer1 or it is accepted by reviewer1.
Under the condition that reviewer1 is unavailable for deadline1, paper conf_paper is either rejected by reviewer1 or accepted by reviewer1.
Reviewer1 is unavailable for deadline1 or reviewer1 is sick for deadline1.
If reviewer1 is sick for deadline1, then paper conf_paper is either rejected by reviewer1 or accepted by reviewer1.
Provided that reviewer1's flight with airlineX is cancelled, then whenever reviewer1 is sick for deadline1, paper conf_paper is either rejected by reviewer1 or accepted by reviewer1.
Either reviewer1's flight with airlineX is cancelled or reviewer1 has a train available on routeY.
If reviewer1 has a train available on routeY, then under the condition that reviewer1 is sick for deadline1, paper conf_paper is either rejected by reviewer1 or accepted by reviewer1.
If the paper conf_paper is presented remotely by author1, then the conference academic_conf2024 is successful.
Either the paper conf_paper is presented remotely by author1 or it is presented in person by author1.
Provided that the paper conf_paper is presented in person by author1, the presentation of conf_paper is recorded by tech_team.
Whenever the paper conf_paper is presented in person by author1, the conference academic_conf2024 is successful.
If the presentation of conf_paper is recorded by tech_team, then the conference academic_conf2024 is successful.

If it is not the case that the publication of conf_paper proceedings by editor1 leads to the recording of the presentation by tech_team implying conference success, then manual review is needed for conf_paper by chair1.
Paper conf_paper is accepted by reviewer1.
The proceedings of conf_paper are published by editor1.
The conference academic_conf2024 is successful.
It is not the case that manual review is needed for conf_paper by chair1.
Paper conf_paper is not rejected by reviewer1.

(A1 → G).natural: Provided that paper conf_paper is accepted by reviewer1, the conference academic_conf2024 will be successful.

(A10 → (A9 → G)).natural: If proceedings of conf_paper are published by editor1, then whenever the presentation of conf_paper is recorded by tech_team, the conference academic_conf2024 follows as successful.

(A2 ∨ A1).natural: Either paper conf_paper is rejected by reviewer1 or it is accepted by reviewer1.

(A3 → (A2 ∨ A1)).natural: Under the condition that reviewer1 is unavailable for deadline1, paper conf_paper is either rejected by reviewer1 or accepted by reviewer1.

(A3 ∨ A4).natural: Reviewer1 is unavailable for deadline1 or reviewer1 is sick for deadline1.

(A4 → (A2 ∨ A1)).natural: If reviewer1 is sick for deadline1, then paper conf_paper is either rejected by reviewer1 or accepted by reviewer1.

(A5 → (A4 → (A2 ∨ A1))).natural: Provided that reviewer1's flight with airlineX is cancelled, then whenever reviewer1 is sick for deadline1, paper conf_paper is either rejected by reviewer1 or accepted by reviewer1.

(A5 ∨ A6).natural: Either reviewer1's flight with airlineX is cancelled or reviewer1 has a train available on routeY.

(A6 → (A4 → (A2 ∨ A1))).natural: If reviewer1 has a train available on routeY, then under the condition that reviewer1 is sick for deadline1, paper conf_paper is either rejected by reviewer1 or accepted by reviewer1.

(A7 → G).natural: If the paper conf_paper is presented remotely by author1, then the conference academic_conf2024 is successful.

(A7 ∨ A8).natural: Either the paper conf_paper is presented remotely by author1 or it is presented in person by author1.

(A8 → A9).natural: Provided that the paper conf_paper is presented in person by author1, the presentation of conf_paper is recorded by tech_team.

(A8 → G).natural: Whenever the paper conf_paper is presented in person by author1, the conference academic_conf2024 is successful.

(A9 → G).natural: If the presentation of conf_paper is recorded by tech_team, then the conference academic_conf2024 is successful.

(¬(A10 → (A9 → G)) → A11).natural: If it is not the case that the publication of conf_paper proceedings by editor1 leads to the recording of the presentation by tech_team implying conference success, then manual review is needed for conf_paper by chair1.

A1.natural: Paper conf_paper is accepted by reviewer1.

A10.natural: The proceedings of conf_paper are published by editor1.

¬A11.natural: It is not the case that manual review is needed for conf_paper by chair1.

¬A2.natural: Paper conf_paper is not rejected by reviewer1.
